3 Steps to play

1. Install Wallett
Install Phoenix Wallet for Signum

Phoenix is the easy to use wallet for Signum

2. Create Account
Create a new Account with Phoenix

Phoenix will guide you through the creation of your own personal Signum Account.
Be sure to save the newly-generated passphrase.
This is your key to access your Signum Account,so never share it!

3. Load Signa
Load your Account with Signa

To play you need Signa in your SignumAccount to pay for the bets and some very low transaction fees.
Buy your Signa via BTDEX or BITTREX.
